data>getBoundingBox.yml@0|country.description: Country of interest. For list of countries look here https://geoio.biodiversite-quebec.ca/docs#/default/validate_country_name_validate_country_name_get.
data>getBoundingBox.yml@0|country.label: Country

data>getBoundingBox.yml@0|state.description: State or province of interest (leave blank if you want the full country). For list of accepted region names look here https://geoio.biodiversite-quebec.ca/docs#/default/validate_state_name_validate_state_name_get.
data>getBoundingBox.yml@0|state.label: State/Province

data>getBoundingBox.yml@0|study_area_fil.description: Upload a file of a custom study area
data>getBoundingBox.yml@0|study_area_fil.label: File for study area

data>loadFromStac.yml@2|collections_item.description: Vector of strings, collection name followed by '|' followed by item id
data>loadFromStac.yml@2|collections_item.label: STAC collection items

data>loadFromStac.yml@2|spatial_res.description: Integer, spatial resolution of the rasters in meters
data>loadFromStac.yml@2|spatial_res.label: Spatial resolution

data>loadFromStac.yml@2|resampling.description: Resampling method used when rescaling the raster layers. See [gdalwarp](https://gdal.org/en/latest/programs/gdalwarp.html) for description.
data>loadFromStac.yml@2|resampling.label: Resampling method

data>loadFromStac.yml@2|aggregation.description: Method used to aggregate items that overlay each other
data>loadFromStac.yml@2|aggregation.label: Aggregation method

pipeline@3.label: Coordinate reference system
pipeline@3.description:
Numerical value referring to the EPSG code (European Petroleum Survey Group) associated with the spatial reference system that will be used as a reference for the study area.
This numerical value specifies the projection and geodetic datum used to define the coordinates and spatial representation of the data in the study area.
This MUST be in a projected reference system (not lat long).

For further information on coordinate systems and EPSG codes, you can access the official database on the EPSG website at [https://epsg.org/home.html](https://epsg.org/home.html).
The website provides documentation, resources, and tools for searching and understanding the EPSG codes used in various geospatial contexts.

*Leave blank if you want the bounding box to be in EPSG:4326.*

data>getBoundingBox.yml@0|study_area_pol.description: Polygon of the study area in a geopackage with the chosen coordinate reference system
data>getBoundingBox.yml@0|study_area_pol.label: Polygon of study area

metadata.name: Zonal statistics
metadata.description: This pipeline extracts zonal statistics for any STAC catalog item in a country or region of interest.
